name: flattenTake
signature: <A, E2, E, R>(self: Stream<Take<A, E2>, E, R>) => Stream<A, E2 | E, R>
description:
Unwraps `Exit` values and flatten chunks that also signify end-of-stream
by failing with `None`.
documentation:
Unwraps `Exit` values and flatten chunks that also signify end-of-stream
by failing with `None`.
